entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
